server.model

Class CourseCatalogue

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.model.CourseCatalogue

  • public class CourseCatalogue
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to manage the list of all the classes once the program has started
    Author:
    Joel Happ + Jerome Gobeil

      • searchCatalogue

        public Course searchCatalogue(java.lang.String courseName,
                              int courseNum)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Searches the course catalogue for the given course name and course number.
        Parameters:
        courseName - Name to search for, e.g. "MATH"
        courseNum - Number of the course, e.g. "201"
        Returns:
        the course if its found, or null if its not.
        Throws:
        If - the course could not be found
        java.lang.Exception
